title: New Star Guardian Concepts (Rakan, Taric, Xayah, Taliah, Nidalee)

embed.description: Some Star Guardian designs I've made. Hope you like them.

body:
Hello, everyone! When I saw the new skin set... i just had to make my own team. :)

{{champion:497}} and {{champion:498}} : I would like them to share skin sets, I got the idea for Rakan so Xayah had to follow. Yes, they are newer champions, but this is for the next set of SG skins, which may been 1+ year depending on how well this new set sells. If they haven't received a skin by then, then they are due. 

{{champion:163}} : I've seen this suggested here and there and I thought it would be adorable. She only has her launch skin.

{{champion:44}} : He doesn't have that many skins, only one since his rework, three otherwise. He has to have one, he is perfect for it.

{{champion:76}} : Before you chew me out on her having a lot of skins; hear me out. She is the only champion that fits the theme of being able to transform into her familiar. She is an older champion. Half of her skins are recolours, and only two are 975 +, and half her skins are legacy or seasonal and not readily available. She also hasn't received a new skin in two years. She is one of leagues oldest champions and is due for a legendary.

I dislike that Taliyah's familiar is a reindeer. Coupled with her being blue, I think it's too similar to her existing skin. I mean, I love deer (stags in particular) - but I don't think it's... appropriate? 

I'm also slightly disappointed that Xayah and Rakan's familiars don't have a shared appearance or theme, in the sense of being kindred like their guardian. During Xayah and Rakan's shared dance, I want their familiars to also dance and it look appropriately yin and yang.

But, all-in-all, pretty awesome choices. I'm also particularly fond of the fact you included two males, especially non-twink males, as well as the fact you added a second tank. Poppy is currently supporting 9 squishies - so Taric is a welcomed addition.

Honestly, I had no idea what to do for Taliyah, but I'll welcome any suggestions for what it could be. I may draw it, it is a concept, and in no way finalised (if Riot even takes these)

I did try, with imbuing red and green respectively, I liked Rakans, but again, had no idea what to do for Xayah. again, I'll look at suggestions.

I included the two males that I thought fit best for this line, I'm not sure if really any of the other males would fit at all. I do agree there needs to be more tanks, I wanted to do a jungler but the only ones that really seemed to fit was Vi?

Are there any mythological creatures known for their ability to construct? Or, any mythological creatures that are believed to cause avalanches? Khepri came to mind for the fact he pushes the sun across the sky, but I'm not sure how you could make a giant beetle look cute and familiar-y. I'm just imagining having her familiar being the one that weaves her ultimate. Similar to that scene in Fellowship of the Ring with the horses-in-the-waves, her ultimate could be her familiar stampeding forward with waves of cosmic energy training behind it. A stag almost makes sense given its horns. You could also do a jackalope, although since they are already present on Summoner's Rift, it might be a bit weird to see a star guardian version. 

There's the fan champion, DhaMa, who is two creatures that together resemble yin and yang. I don't think it specifically has to be about colour, but also their body shape. I would hope for them to look like they complete each other. Alternatively, they could look completely different, but their bodies should easily lend themselves to intimate animations - like the two of them curling up together for a hug. One of them having wings will almost certainly make any play animations between their two familiars really awkwards, since wings aren't particularly flexible. I love your ferret like design on Xayah's, perhaps Rakan's familiar could have an identical body but with mohawk feathers most of the way down its back, instead of a pair of wings, and maybe no tail feathers?

http://i.imgur.com/Rq2opzn.jpg http://i.imgur.com/36vwNBj.jpg

I was looking at the list of champions and picking a jungler is actually pretty hard. I'm not sure Vi would suit it. Maybe Diana or Evelynn? Ahri even has a taunt for Evelynn referring to her as the girl under the bleaches. Your server says "NA", so maybe you understand what Riot intends it to mean. If it's referring to her as a goth/wallflower, than it could be an opportunity for a more gothic Star Guardian - the edgey kid who got star powers, and finds the whole situation totally lame and boring. 

http://i.imgur.com/GoRh6gu.jpg http://i.imgur.com/2J4wZed.jpg http://i.imgur.com/8IjsIlz.jpg
